name: NEHotspotConfiguration
desc: Configuration settings for a Wi-Fi network.

items.name: init(ssid: String)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by an SSID, for an open Wi-Fi network.

items.name: init(ssid: String, passphrase: String, isWEP: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by an SSID, for a protected WEP or WPA/WPA2 personal Wi-Fi network.

items.name: init(ssid: String, eapSettings: NEHotspotEAPSettings)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by an SSID, for a WPA/WPA2 enterprise Wi-Fi network with EAP settings.

items.name: init(hs20Settings: NEHotspotHS20Settings, eapSettings: NEHotspotEAPSettings)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by a domain name, for a Hotspot 2.0 Wi-Fi network with HS 2.0 and EAP settings.

items.name: init(ssidPrefix: String)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by an SSID prefix string, for an open Wi-Fi network.

items.name: init(ssidPrefix: String, passphrase: String, isWEP: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a new hotspot configuration, identified by an SSID prefix string, for a protected WEP or WPA/WPA2 personal Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var ssid: String
items.desc: The SSID of an open, WEP, WPA/WPA2 personal, or WPA/WPA2 enterprise Wi-Fi network.

items.name: var ssidPrefix: String
items.desc: The string used to match networks against a known SSID prefix.

items.name: var lifeTimeInDays: NSNumber
items.desc: The number of days the network retains the associated configuration.

items.name: var joinOnce: Bool
items.desc: Restricts the lifetime of a configuration to the operating status of the app that created it.

items.name: var hidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the visibility of the SSID.
